title: "Machine-learning models vulnerable to undetectable backdoors: new claim"
excerpt: "Boffins from UC Berkeley, MIT, and the Institute for Advanced Study in the United States have devised techniques to implant undetectable backdoors in machine learning (ML) models. Their work suggests ML models developed by third parties fundamentally cannot be trusted."
